plot: Cultured and snobby brothers Harlan and Harcourt Harkelstein, with rival camera crews, cover the Adult Video Expo in Las Vegas. Each tries to out-scoop the other before getting hopelessly drunk.
title: City of Sin
plot_es: Cultured and snobby brothers Harlan and Harcourt Harkelstein, with rival camera crews, cover the Adult Video Expo in Las Vegas. Each tries to out-scoop the other before getting hopelessly drunk.
plot_en: Cultured and snobby brothers Harlan and Harcourt Harkelstein, with rival camera crews, cover the Adult Video Expo in Las Vegas. Each tries to out-scoop the other before getting hopelessly drunk.
